title: Mr. Peabody & Sherman 2014 DVDR R4 NTSC Thyrso10
description:
Mr. Peabody (Ty Burrell) is the smartest dog in the world. After winning the Nobel Prize and create many inventions that helped humanity, he decides to adopt a human baby found abandoned in the street. Responsible for their education, Peabody builds a time machine to show the young Sherman (Max Charles) historical facts are present in it. However, a new challenge presents itself to Sherman when he for the first time, need to go to school. There he becomes the target of taunts Penny (Ariel Winter), who ends up fighting in the courtyard. Fearful of losing custody of the boy, Peabody organizes a dinner at his home with Penny and her parents. Only that once again causes the girl Sherman, who just disregarding the orientation of the adoptive father and shows him a time machine. Before long they both travel through time, causing various problems.
